item.title: Can't get JCalendar to select a specific date when opening
item.description: How to get around the bug that in some versions of JCalendar prevents the initial date from being set.

item.title: Choosing a Domain Registrar
item.description: Trying to decide on a registrar? Here are some things to keep in mind so you don't get burned.

item.title: Setting up Wireless with DSL
item.description: Using a Cisco 678 DSL modem and want to setup wireless? It's trickier than it sounds, here's how I got it to work.
